summary: This is a memorandum from the Butterfly Trust authorizing a wire transfer of $237,270 from an account managed by Richard Kahn. The document is marked as confidential pursuant to Federal Rule of Criminal Procedure 6(e) and appears to be part of the Epstein financial records.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Appears as the sender/authorizer of a wire transfer from the Butterfly Trust account.

events.title: Butterfly Trust Wire Transfer
events.description: A wire transfer of $237,270 is authorized from a Butterfly Trust account.

keyFacts: The Butterfly Trust, associated with Jeffrey Epstein, authorized a wire transfer of $237,270 on March 30, 2015.
Richard Kahn is identified as the individual authorizing or managing the transfer from the trust account.
The document is marked as confidential under Federal Rule of Criminal Procedure 6(e), indicating it was part of grand jury proceedings or related criminal investigation materials.
